dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm where ancient magic still lingers in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Eira Shadowglow
dialogues.text: I sense a darkness growing in the heart of the forest. We must investigate and put an end to it before it spreads.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Bold
dialogues.text: I'm with you, Eira. I've heard rumors of strange creatures lurking in those woods. Let's gear up and get moving!
